# infra-components
Angular2 agnostic components library

# Build

- clone this repo
- `npm install`
- `npm start`

Done !

# Use it

`npm install web-education/infra-components --save-dev`

>In your code

```typescript
import { InfraComponentsModule } from 'infra-components'

@NgModule({
    imports: [
        /* ... */
        InfraComponentsModule
        /* ... */
     ]
})
```
